content.rendered:
Our Engineers and Naval Architects have expertise in a wide range of services in relation to load-out and transportation engineering of offshore structures, modules and other types of cargo including, but not limited to, the following assessments:

Load-Out

  • Site Assessment
  • Load-out Methodology and Analysis (by Lifting, Trailer, Skidding)
  • Assessment of Barge/ Vessel (Under-keel clearance, stowage plan, ballast plan and stability check, global and local strength checks)
  • Mooring and Fender System Design

Cargo Securing

  • Grillage and seafastening design
  • Fatigue analysis

Marine/ Offshore Transportation Study

  • Stowage plan and vessel/ barge afloat condition
  • Vessel/ barge motion and stability analysis
  • Vessel global and local strengths check
  • Towing tug bollard pull calculation
  • Towing arrangement and procedure
  • Passage plan / tow route assessment

Road Transportation Study

  • Stowage and lashing plan
  • Transporter capacity check
  • Route assessment

Structural Integrity Check

Risk Assessment

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Transportation & Installation Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our T&I department consists of project managers, naval architects, structural engineers, field engineers and master mariners. The team has many years of experience within the offshore industry, and in locations such as China, S.E. Asia, Middle East and Nigeria.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Project Cargo
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our team specialises in providing marine warranty services for marine transportation of high-value and/or high-risk project cargo covering: Suitability and Operational Condition Inspection of Marine Spread for Transportation of Project Cargo (Fit for Purpose)Engineering Review and Approval of Sea-Fastening Design and Transportation Manuals Load-Out, Stowage and Securing Approval Approval for…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Warranty Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The AqualisBraemar teams of Marine Warranty Surveyors, Engineers and Master Mariners act to protect Underwriters’ interests or self-insured Clients. We provide independent third party review and approval of offshore projects.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Jack-up Engineering
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Based primarily in the UK with representatives worldwide, the jack-up team consists of naval architects and structural and geotechnical engineers, who and are jack-up specialists.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dr George Mowatt | Technical Director (Expert Witness)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: London | +44 (0) 7836 278 238Discipline: Naval Architecture BSC. Structural Engineering PhD.
